import './App.css'; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Routes, Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Home from './pages/home' import Top from './pages/top' import Auth from './pages/auth' import Watched from './pages/watched' import Watchlist from './pages/watchlist' import Movie from './pages/movie' function App() { const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [authenticated, setAuthenticated] = useState(true) const isAuthenticated = localStorage.getItem("authenticated") const userId = localStorage.getItem("userId") const username = localStorage.getItem("username") useEffect(() => { const isAuthenticated = localStorage.getItem('authenticated'); setAuthenticated(isAuthenticated === 'true'); }, [setAuthenticated]); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("authenticated") setAuthenticated(false); localStorage.removeItem("userId") window.location.reload(); console.log("logout: ", authenticated) } return (
